backend/main.mo: Defines the main Motoko actor with authorization mixin, event ordering logic, and all core types for competitions, payments, results, and user profiles.
backend/migration.mo: Provides a migration function converting competitions with a single entryFee into the new feeMode-based structure.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of many frontend files for reference in build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML page loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/public/razorpay.config.json: Stores Razorpay payment configuration including key, currency, and theme.
frontend/src/api/errors.ts: Normalizes backend and client error messages into user-friendly strings, covering sessions, payments, authorization, and competitions.
frontend/src/api/queryKeys.ts: Defines a set of typed React Query cache keys for competitions, user data, admin data, and solve sessions.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up routing, providers, and all application pages using TanStack Router and React Query.
frontend/src/components/admin/Competitio: Provides a form UI for selecting and configuring different competition pricing modes and updates the parent with the chosen fee structure.
Guards admin-only routes by checking admin status and showing loading or access-denied states when appropriate.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Renders a login/logout button using Internet Identity and handles authentication state, login retries, and cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Protects routes requiring authentication, showing a login prompt or loading state when the user is not authenticated.
frontend/src/components/competition/Comp: Displays a competition summary card with status, dates, limits, and navigates to the competition detail page when clicked.
Provides the main application layout with header, navigation, footer, and special handling for solve-flow pages.
frontend/src/components/leaderboard/Lead: Renders a leaderboard table with ranks, profiles, Ao5 calculation, and navigation to competitor public profiles.
frontend/src/components/profile/Payments: Displays the user's payment history with sorting, loading, and error states using cards and scrollable layout.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileM: Renders a dropdown profile menu showing user info and providing navigation and logout actions.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Modal dialog for creating a new user profile by submitting email and display name.
frontend/src/components/solve/Inspection: Implements a 15-second inspection timer with penalty and DNF handling before a solve.
frontend/src/components/solve/SolveCompl: Shows a post-solve completion screen with navigation actions and instructions for submitting video evidence.
frontend/src/components/solve/SolveTimer: Provides a solve timer with start/stop controls and formatted time output, calling a callback on completion.
frontend/src/config/razorpay.ts: Loads and caches Razorpay frontend config from a JSON file with fallback defaults.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBeforeUnloadWarnin: Adds a beforeunload handler to warn users when leaving a page if enabled.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Fetches the caller’s user profile once an actor is available and not loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useGoLiveAttempt.ts: Manages a multi‑step simulated deployment flow with step tracking, errors, and diagnostic logs.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login/clear actions, and identity initialization via context.
Blocks browser back navigation via a confirmation prompt when enabled.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for competitions, profiles, results, and leaderboards using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/lib/ao5.ts: Computes average‑of‑5 scores with DNF rules for time attempts.
frontend/src/lib/competitionPricing.ts: Utility functions to determine paid competitions and format fee information.
frontend/src/lib/csv.ts: Exports competition results to a downloadable CSV file with formatted attempt data.
frontend/src/lib/dateUtils.ts: Formats bigint timestamps into a readable date string.
frontend/src/lib/goLiveDiagnostics.ts: Simulates a multi-step deployment process with random failures and provides utilities to generate and normalize deployment error messages.
frontend/src/lib/goLivePreflight.ts: Runs preflight checks for config files, payment settings, network reachability, and build artifacts before deployment.
frontend/src/lib/razorpay.ts: Loads the Razorpay checkout script and opens the payment UI using backend-provided order data.
frontend/src/lib/solveSession.ts: Manages tab-scoped solve session tokens using sessionStorage with utilities to store, retrieve, and clear them.
frontend/src/lib/timeUtils.ts: Formats millisecond times into seconds with hundredths or returns DNF for invalid values.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCompetitio: Lists all competitions for admins with actions to create, edit, delete, and lock or unlock competitions.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCreateComp: Form page for admins to create a competition, including event selection, scrambles, status, and pricing validation.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminEditCompet: Allows admins to edit an existing competition’s details, events, scrambles, and pricing with preloaded data.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminGoLivePage: Runs preflight checks and executes a multi‑step go‑live process with diagnostics and status tracking.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminLandingPag: Admin dashboard linking to management sections and providing quick actions like creating competitions or starting go‑live.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminResultsPag: Interface for viewing, recalculating, exporting, and toggling visibility of competition results per event.
Admin page listing users with search, and actions to block, unblock, delete, view solve history, and reset competition status.
frontend/src/pages/CompetitionDetailPage: Displays competition details, handles event selection, payment flow, and starting a solve session.
Lists competitions grouped by status with loading handling and visual sections.
frontend/src/pages/LeaderboardPage.tsx: Displays a competition leaderboard with event filtering, loading states, and competitor navigation.
frontend/src/pages/LeaderboardsHubPage.t: Shows a list of competitions with status badges and links to each competition’s leaderboard.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Provides authenticated users a profile editor with display name, country, gender fields, and payment history tabs.
frontend/src/pages/PublicProfilePage.tsx: Displays a public competitor profile with basic info, stats, and event-grouped results.
frontend/src/pages/SolveFlowPage.tsx: Manages the timed solve flow for competitions including inspection, solving, submission, and session recovery.
frontend/src/types/admin.ts: Defines admin-only types for result inputs, public profile info, and a lightweight UserSummary model.
frontend/src/types/backend-extended.ts: Provides extended frontend typings mirroring backend models, including competitions, results, leaderboards, and session state.
frontend/src/types/domain.ts: Maps Event enums to display labels and defines constants for all events and the default event.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters, including hash-routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom theming, colors, animations, and plugin integration.
project_state.json: Project state snapshot describing the platform’s features, architecture notes, issues, and roadmap metadata.
